title: Real-Life Project-Based Chinese Communication Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of at least 50 basic Chinese characters and acquisition of fundamental daily conversation vocabulary
context.additional_context: Customized project design reflecting learners' diverse professional experiences, solving real-world tasks through community partnerships.

learning_goals: Oral presentation at HSK Level 3 based on real-life scenario projects (travel, finance, healthcare)
Enhancing understanding of target language culture through comparative cultural projects (e.g., holiday customs in Korea and China)
Achieving over 80% task completion rate through collaborative learning team projects

resources: Cultural Experience Kit (Traditional Craft Materials, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
